attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: So many people are injured at work - the killing of a Preston social worker today highlights how difficult areas of working with the public are, undertaking roles on behalf of society, like child protection and policing, with poor support from line manager and ministers. Like Suzie Lamplugh, this victim of violence, was undertaking work on behalf of local authorities, with limited understanding of legal responsibilities of vicarious liability. The petitioner is calling on the P.M. to address this issues - no wonder your policies aren't working if the people implementing them aren't paid, govt staff are subjected to  violence and Ministers show little regard for supervising agency employers - this a typical public sector problem ! Public sector workers are NOIT public property - we are people's daughters and sons ...
